text: Disney Channel Portugal is a television channel in Portugal for children and youths. It broadcasts programs and movies from Walt Disney Pictures. In Portugal, it broadcasts on NOS, MEO, Vodafone and Nowo. The channel broadcasts nearly all the current programming of Disney. ==Disney Cinemagic Portugal == Disney Cinemagic Portugal premiered on 1 October 2008. As in other countries, it is dedicated to Disney movie franchises and animated series. This Channel is different from Disney Channel Portugal. It is only available in ZON TvCabo and AR Telecom. It is the first channel in childrens television channel in Portugal to broadcast in High Definition. ==Programming== This is a list of television programs currently broadcast (in first-run or reruns), scheduled to be broadcast or formerly broadcast on this channel. ===Current programming=== ===Original programming=== ====Live-action==== *Bunk'd (March 18, 2016 - present) *Raven's Home (February 16, 2018 - present) *Coop & Cami Ask the World (May 27, 2019 - present) *Gabby Duran & The Unsittables (March 9, 2020 - present) *Sydney to the Max (January 4, 2021 - present) *Secrets of Sulphur Springs (May 1, 2021 - present) ====Animated==== *Mickey Mouse (September 13, 2013 - present) *Elena of Avalor (October 8, 2016 - present) *DuckTales (November 11, 2017 - present) *Big Hero 6: The Series (October 12, 2018 - present) *Big City Greens (July 1, 2019 - present) *Amphibia (September 14, 2020 - present) *The Owl House (January 11, 2021 - present) * Big Blue (August 31, 2022 - present) ====Reruns==== *Quack Pack (June 17, 2013 - present) *Timon and Pumbaa (November 2, 2013 - present) *Kim Possible (April 29, 2013 - present) *Lilo & Stitch (2013 - present) *The Emperor's New School (2009 - present) *The Replacements (June 17, 2013 - present) *Comedy Bites (September 13, 2013 - present) *Huinfig (January 1, 2022 - present) ===Acquired programming=== ====Disney XD==== *Pair of Kings (May 13, 2011 - present) *Lab Rats (June 16, 2012 - present) *Kickin' It (September 22, 2012 - present) *Drama (September 20, 2020 - present) ====Teletoon==== *My Babysitter's a Vampire (October 19, 2011 - present) *Atomic Betty (2011 - present) ====YTV==== *Mr. Young (January 7, 2013 - present) ====Hub==== *Littlest Pet Shop (June 1, 2013 - present) ====Network Ten==== *H2O: Just Add Water (2011 - present) ===Other programming=== *Famous 5: On the Case (June 28, 2008 - present) *Casper's Scare School (2009 - present) *The Gnoufs (2006 - present) *W.I.T.C.H.
